snippet: Equipment and documents were seized by Israeli troops. Their stated reason for the raid, interference by broadcasts on unauthorized frequencies, was hotly disputed by Palestinian officials.
abstract: Israeli troops raid two Palestinian television stations in Ramallah in the occupied West Bank, confiscating transmitters, computer hard drives and documents; Israeli ministry says that it repeatedly warned both stations that they were using frequencies that violated Israeli-Palestinian agreements and that interfered with communications and transmission systems in Israel; Palestinian Authority says that it had received no such warnings.
lead_paragraph: Equipment and documents were seized by Israeli troops. Their stated reason for the raid, interference by broadcasts on unauthorized frequencies, was hotly disputed by Palestinian officials.

headline.seo: Israeli Troops Raid Two Palestinian TV Stations in Ramallah
headline.main: Israeli Troops Raid Two Palestinian TV Stations in the West Bank
headline.print_headline: Israeli Troops Raid Two Palestinian TV Stations in the West Bank
